overallCOMMENTS: updated 3/18/2018 for allowing general options in this file
created an options structure, which will
drive the Sinks for various formats
format_optionsCOMMENTS: format-specific options drive certain Sink objects
if an option is not present, or this section
is not present, assume DEFAULT behavior of
HTML_MULTIPLE_PAGES, all HTML output is either
a single web page, or else all Sections
HTML_FRONT_MATERIAL, do or do not include
front matter web pages, such as title page
HTML_FORMAT, is format used, which includes POEM
See, these options are NOT GENERIC!!
format_options: NOTUSED, setting is done in FOP configuration file, when actual PDF is created! So, Java code does not have to perform any special processing
